# create ticket plutus file
saveNFTPolicy (assetClass "43e051748b5010ed5b3c06ba1b377af6465e949633d2e7c2ce58059f" "Ticket Creator") (TxOutRef "922f2c0832091e956b666f64f14d37918a3308e604e2bf99f571e86e59e052ad" 1) "Ticket"

# mint ticket
scripts/ticket/mint.sh \
  company \
  d64a04004c539852bad346e866d96070916ee31c6fa6a5d10145f1695f34dc4e#2 \
  f8d4d6b984a1b348bbb198b6a25eceeded9b516fc50b676b7912c5582ba73534#0 \
  d64a04004c539852bad346e866d96070916ee31c6fa6a5d10145f1695f34dc4e#1 \
  d0f90675daf8bac170da417c10e4b7faddc73c2afaf28df4288e362d023bb595#1

# burn ticket
scripts/ticket/burn.sh \
  user2 \
  c175e76b6f15b0c2e2df10d420ebb1a326bc324638b2f8ef01c381284cb44dff#2 \
  c175e76b6f15b0c2e2df10d420ebb1a326bc324638b2f8ef01c381284cb44dff#1 \
  e9c729d97cdbaafd0b410ad6078f6facb3dd93a7a74a3c5e3f1edcc5570acc4b#1 \
  d64a04004c539852bad346e866d96070916ee31c6fa6a5d10145f1695f34dc4e#2

scripts/vesting/grab35.sh \
  user2 \
  d6e02ff7632bf0db0eff6017d93d1572fdb18e88f252844eccf5894509b0eae5#2 \
  d64a04004c539852bad346e866d96070916ee31c6fa6a5d10145f1695f34dc4e#0 \
  e9c729d97cdbaafd0b410ad6078f6facb3dd93a7a74a3c5e3f1edcc5570acc4b#1


scripts/vesting/send-fund-to-script.sh \
  user2 \
  50e7fd32b42bb3bb27afbe3b15af8bfb73a5c2855a571ec12b2d782e0b22c6a9#1 \
  50e7fd32b42bb3bb27afbe3b15af8bfb73a5c2855a571ec12b2d782e0b22c6a9#0 \
  922f2c0832091e956b666f64f14d37918a3308e604e2bf99f571e86e59e052ad#1
